label: clinical_signal_03_dx_renal_biomarker_study_010
content:
## 2024-05-06 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment

- Active: 68
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 20
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 4

#### By Cohort
- 10mg: 15
- 25mg: 16
- 50mg: 20
- 100mg: 21

- NGAL Dose Correlation (r): 0.459
- eGFR Dose Correlation (r): -0.362

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: RB-AE-1021, Description: hyperkalemia, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: false, Cohort: 50mg
- AE ID: RB-AE-1078, Description: urinary tract infection, Grade: 1, Relatedness: not related, Resolved: true, Cohort: 25mg
- AE ID: RB-AE-1008, Description: fatigue, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Cohort: 50mg

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: RB-PD-1015, Description: Lab kit expired, replacement used, Severity: minor

### Events
- Drug supply reconciliation completed at 25 sites
- Bioanalytical lab shipment: 25 frozen urine aliquots dispatched
- Drug supply reconciliation completed at 43 sites

### Notes
- Week 10: Renal biomarker collection on schedule. 72 subjects enrolled across 4 cohorts. eGFR and urinary biomarkers within expected variability.
